summary: Email from July 10, 2019, regarding potential FBI assistance for executing a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment. The email indicates most of the C20 team is in Florida interviewing victims and requests assistance for the operation.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: CC'ed on the email requesting assistance for executing a search warrant at Epstein's Manhattan residence.

events.title: Planned search warrant execution at Epstein's Manhattan residence
events.description: C20 (likely an FBI unit) plans to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

events.title: FBI interviews of victims in Florida
events.description: Most of the C20 team is in Florida conducting interviews with victims of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: On July 10, 2019, plans were being made to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment the following day.
Most of the FBI's C20 team was in Florida interviewing victims at the time, creating a need for additional assistance in New York.
The email demonstrates active, parallel investigation efforts in multiple locations (Florida victim interviews and New York evidence collection) shortly before Epstein's arrest.
